message: They have strict daily limits on how much they serve to it lasts for two weeks and enough people get to try it.
i'm ginog to be there at 3:14pm
No matter, they had lots of other tasty beers, including some very interesting sours.
I hit up Russian River brewing yesterday evening with some friends but I was too late!
@nickoneill i'm hoping to try some at the russian river event at pi bar on tuesday
Not this year, but my neighbor brewed up a big batch based on it. Haven't tried it yet, but he's having a big party soon.
They're going to release a keg at Vine St (run by Mountain Sun Brewery) here in Denver in a few days. Too bad I'll be at work for the 20 min it's available.
